task.title: Record screen
task.shortdesc: Once the Scenes and Sources are set, recording can be started.

taskbody.context:
This section covers the steps to record a screen.
There can be several recording settings. Agents can refer to the link for full list of recording settings. https://obsproject.com/kb/standard-recording-output-guide

step.cmd: In the Controls tab, click Start Recording.
step.stepresult: The Start Recording button turns blue in color.

step.cmd: Traverse between scenes while providing audio inputs from mic/aux.
Click Pause Recording button, as applicable.
To resume recording, click Pause Recording button again.
Click Stop Recording once finished with the recording activity.
In Files menu, click Show Recordings.
step.stepresult: All the recorded videos are displayed on an Agent's machine.
